question.question_text: Does the government publish anonymized sex-disaggregated data on unpaid care work?
question.hint: Sex-disaggregated data on unpaid care work include separate information about the time spent by  women and men performing tasks related to unpaid care work. Data must be collected and published by a public entity, such as the national statistics office.
